name: Harriet Van Horne
comment: “Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.”

name: Wolfgang Puck
comment: “Cooking is like painting or writing a song. Just as there are only so many notes or colors, there are only so many flavors—it’s how you combine them that sets you apart.”

name: Guy Fieri
comment: “Cooking with kids is not just about ingredients, recipes, and cooking. It’s about harnessing imagination, empowerment, and creativity.”

name: Gordon Ramsay
comment: “So when people ask me, ‘What do you think of Michelin?’ I don’t cook for guides. I cook for customers.”

name: Craig Claiborne.jpg
comment: Cooking is at once child’s play and adult joy. And cooking done with care is an act of love.

name: Paul Theroux
comment: Cooking requires confident guesswork and improvisation—experimentation and substitution, dealing with failure and uncertainty in a creative way.

name: Thomas Keller
comment: A recipe has no soul. You as the cook must bring soul to the recipe.”
